test-questions.name: fish-question
options: No, I talked him into giving himself up.
No, I was sitting here minding my own business when the crazy thing jumped into my pail.
No, it's a plastic model to get people like you to start fascinating conversations.

code-assignments.name: foobar-game
code-assignments.description: Let's play `foo-bar` game! Implement function, that returns `foo` if given input divisible by 3, `bar` if divisible by 5 and `foobar` if divisible by 3 AND 5, otherwise return number itself.

code-assignments.name: harder
code-assignments.description: Implement a function that reverse a input string

code-assignments.name: creative
code-assignments.description: Wanna prove you are The Best? Prove it! Draw us a fireworks! Make it awesome! (Canvas 2d context object is given as argument)
